title: LBJ Memorial Grove on the Potomac: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits are required for certain activities within the park such as: Commercial vehicles  Weddings  Any activity in which participants are paying to participate, such as tours or classes  Religious services and ceremonies  Funeral and memorial ceremonies  Filming in the park  Non-Vehicular Commercial Use of the Park
